mapper.select: select Id, OrderId, OrderName, OrderDate, HopeEndDate, FinishedDate, CheckerId, CustOrderId, Contactor, ReportExpTime, Amt, PayAmt, PayStatus, InvoiceStatus, Status, InvoiceId, ReportId, ReportEndDate, ProcRecord, Remark, EdtByUserId, EdtTime, Sender, TelNo, CheckResult, Accepter, PayRemark, InvoiceRemark, PayDate, PayRecorder, InvoiceDate, InvoiceRecorder from hiquality.hqt_checkorder where Id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into hiquality.hqt_checkorder(Id, OrderId, OrderName, OrderDate, HopeEndDate, FinishedDate, CheckerId, CustOrderId, Contactor, ReportExpTime, Amt, PayAmt, PayStatus, InvoiceStatus, Status, InvoiceId, ReportId, ReportEndDate, ProcRecord, Remark, EdtByUserId, EdtTime, Sender, TelNo, CheckResult, Accepter, PayRemark, InvoiceRemark, PayDate, PayRecorder, InvoiceDate, InvoiceRecorder) values (#{id}, #{orderid}, #{ordername}, #{orderdate}, #{hopeenddate}, #{finisheddate}, #{checkerid}, #{custorderid}, #{contactor}, #{reportexptime}, #{amt}, #{payamt}, #{paystatus}, #{invoicestatus}, #{status}, #{invoiceid}, #{reportid}, #{reportenddate}, #{procrecord}, #{remark}, #{edtbyuserid}, #{edttime}, #{sender}, #{telno}, #{checkresult}, #{accepter}, #{payremark}, #{invoiceremark}, #{paydate}, #{payrecorder}, #{invoicedate}, #{invoicerecorder})

insert into hiquality.hqt_checkorder(Id, OrderId, OrderName, OrderDate, HopeEndDate, FinishedDate, CheckerId, CustOrderId, Contactor, ReportExpTime, Amt, PayAmt, PayStatus, InvoiceStatus, Status, InvoiceId, ReportId, ReportEndDate, ProcRecord, Remark, EdtByUserId, EdtTime, Sender, TelNo, CheckResult, Accepter, PayRemark, InvoiceRemark, PayDate, PayRecorder, InvoiceDate, InvoiceRecorder) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.orderid}, #{entity.ordername}, #{entity.orderdate}, #{entity.hopeenddate}, #{entity.finisheddate}, #{entity.checkerid}, #{entity.custorderid}, #{entity.contactor}, #{entity.reportexptime}, #{entity.amt}, #{entity.payamt}, #{entity.paystatus}, #{entity.invoicestatus}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.invoiceid}, #{entity.reportid}, #{entity.reportenddate}, #{entity.procrecord}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.edtbyuserid}, #{entity.edttime}, #{entity.sender}, #{entity.telno}, #{entity.checkresult}, #{entity.accepter}, #{entity.payremark}, #{entity.invoiceremark}, #{entity.paydate}, #{entity.payrecorder}, #{entity.invoicedate}, #{entity.invoicerecorder})

insert into hiquality.hqt_checkorder(Id, OrderId, OrderName, OrderDate, HopeEndDate, FinishedDate, CheckerId, CustOrderId, Contactor, ReportExpTime, Amt, PayAmt, PayStatus, InvoiceStatus, Status, InvoiceId, ReportId, ReportEndDate, ProcRecord, Remark, EdtByUserId, EdtTime, Sender, TelNo, CheckResult, Accepter, PayRemark, InvoiceRemark, PayDate, PayRecorder, InvoiceDate, InvoiceRecorder) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.orderid}, #{entity.ordername}, #{entity.orderdate}, #{entity.hopeenddate}, #{entity.finisheddate}, #{entity.checkerid}, #{entity.custorderid}, #{entity.contactor}, #{entity.reportexptime}, #{entity.amt}, #{entity.payamt}, #{entity.paystatus}, #{entity.invoicestatus}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.invoiceid}, #{entity.reportid}, #{entity.reportenddate}, #{entity.procrecord}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.edtbyuserid}, #{entity.edttime}, #{entity.sender}, #{entity.telno}, #{entity.checkresult}, #{entity.accepter}, #{entity.payremark}, #{entity.invoiceremark}, #{entity.paydate}, #{entity.payrecorder}, #{entity.invoicedate}, #{entity.invoicerecorder})
on duplicate key update Id = values(Id) , OrderId = values(OrderId) , OrderName = values(OrderName) , OrderDate = values(OrderDate) , HopeEndDate = values(HopeEndDate) , FinishedDate = values(FinishedDate) , CheckerId = values(CheckerId) , CustOrderId = values(CustOrderId) , Contactor = values(Contactor) , ReportExpTime = values(ReportExpTime) , Amt = values(Amt) , PayAmt = values(PayAmt) , PayStatus = values(PayStatus) , InvoiceStatus = values(InvoiceStatus) , Status = values(Status) , InvoiceId = values(InvoiceId) , ReportId = values(ReportId) , ReportEndDate = values(ReportEndDate) , ProcRecord = values(ProcRecord) , Remark = values(Remark) , EdtByUserId = values(EdtByUserId) , EdtTime = values(EdtTime) , Sender = values(Sender) , TelNo = values(TelNo) , CheckResult = values(CheckResult) , Accepter = values(Accepter) , PayRemark = values(PayRemark) , InvoiceRemark = values(InvoiceRemark) , PayDate = values(PayDate) , PayRecorder = values(PayRecorder) , InvoiceDate = values(InvoiceDate) , InvoiceRecorder = values(InvoiceRecorder)
